Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class ConverterExt

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.constant.model.Converter
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.ConverterExt
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<Message>
public class ConverterExt
extends Converter
implements Observable<Message>
Converter class Ext. Class that extends Converter and and implements Observable interface. Manage resources and marbles just buyed from the market and that have to be stored or converted in resources.
